data.name: Dar-Tech Inc.
data.description: Dar-tech provides access to industry-respected manufacturers and formulators with high-quality, well-known specialty chemical products, an effective logistics network, and a responsive sales and customer service staff, all of whom deliver technical support with a customer-focused, personal approach.

data.name: Minex
data.description: MINEX® functional filler made from nepheline syenite is proven to offer superior color development, tint retention, and durability to a broad range of paints, coatings, adhesives, sealants, and inks. When added to paints and coatings, MINEX® provides unparalleled durability and resistance to abrasion, fading, cracking, and aging associated with both environmental and chemical exposures.

data.name: IMSIL
data.description: IMSIL® microcrystalline silica fillers are produced from an inert, naturally occurring alpha quartz with a unique grape-like morphology. Finer micronized grades are useful in formulating higher gloss paints and systems requiring controlled particle top size such as Industrial OEM topcoat coats and non-conductive inks. Intermediate size grades offer ideal and uniform gloss control for topcoats, coil coats and increased inter-coat adhesion between primers and topcoats. Coarser grades offer high solids loading with low viscosity,  texture, anti-skid  and abrasion resistance in industrial floor coatings and exterior deck coatings.

data.name: AFCONA 3258
data.description: AFCONA 3258 is a leveling and flow control agent for solvent-based coatings with anti-crater properties. AFCONA 3258 has been developed to replace fluorocarbon modified leveling agents, providing the same leveling and anti-crater performance. It is the 100% active version of AFCONA 3758.

data.name: TYTAN™ CP-317

summary.name: Synonyms
items: Isopropoxytitanium triisostearate, Isopropoxytris(isostearato)titanium, Isopropoxytris(isostearoyloxy)titanium, Isopropyl titanium triisostearate, Isopropyl triisostearoyl titanate, Isopropyltriisostearate titanate, Titanium isopropoxide triisostearate, Titanium triisostearoylisopropoxide, Tris(isooctadecanoato-κ O)(2-propanolato)titanium

data.description: TYTAN™ CP-317 is a coupling agent that can enhance the dispersion of inorganic fillers in polymer systems such as PP and PE by modifying the surface of filler particles. The content of fillers can therefore be increased, saving on the cost of polymer while maintaining the mechanical property.

data.name: Boratherm™ GA
data.description: Boratherm™ GA 6 is submicron ground alumina produced by the calcination of carefully selected synthetic aluminum hydroxide (ATH). Boratherm™ GA grades are often used in combination with Boratherm™ SA and Boratherm™ SG grades in order to enhance a formulation’s particle packing and flow properties, resulting in improved thermal conductivity and stability (filler-settling). To guarantee a consistent product quality of the Boratherm™ GA grades, the chemical composition of the raw materials and the product particle size of the final products are closely monitored and kept within a narrow variation.

data.name: AFCONA 7525
data.description: AFCONA 7525 is a block polymer with acidic functionality and viscosity-depressing properties. It is recommended for use in unsaturated polyester, PVC, epoxy, and polyurethane resin systems and is primarily used as a wetting and dispersing agent in highly filled systems, providing strong viscosity-depressing properties. It has excellent wetting and dispersing properties with pigments and functional fillers such as ATH, resulting in very low viscosity.

data.name: Mistron® ZSC
data.description: Mistron® ZSC is an off-white, high-purity, platy, fine talc that is surface treated for improved dispersion and hydrophobicity, as well as die lubrication in plastics and rubber applications. Additionally, it is used for microcellar foam nucleation in polymeric foams and for improving water resistance and electrical properties in wire and cable applications.

data.name: Magris Talc Select A Sorb R
data.description: Magris Talc Select A Sorb R is a versatile functional mineral that finds its application in a multitude of industries including paper, paints, ceramics, plastics, and others. The product comprises primarily of talc (hydrous magnesium silicate), chlorite, dolomite, and magnesite. It has an odorless nature and appears in a white or off-white to light gray color.

data.name: Syntran® 3211
data.description: Syntran® 3211 is based on shell-core technology. This technology creates a film with very high gloss, block resistance, rub resistance, and printability with multiple ink types. This technology also allows for excellent adhesion over multiple substrate types. This milky dispersion is used in label, board, and packaging coatings (OPV).

data.name: DeCAL 5011
data.description: DeCAL 5011 is a silicone-free defoamer used in various applications, including building & construction, wood coatings, adhesives, textiles/leather/non-wovens, agrochemicals, paint, inks/graphic arts, and specialty chemicals. It provides excellent foam prevention properties at elevated temperatures and pressures. It is a white powder.

data.name: AFCONA 6700
data.description: AFCONA 6700 is an anti-gel additive for air- drying alkyds and heat-cured coating systems. In air-drying alkyd paints, the ketoxime in AFCONA 6700 forms a protective layer on the surface of the paint to reduce the oxidation caused by oxygen in the air.

Acrylic Semi Gloss Trim Enamel White

experts.title: Executive/Management
experts.description: Please reach out to me with any questions, I am happy to assist you in finding the right product or learning more about our storefront

data.name: Dar-Tech Portaryte
data.seo_description: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of sellers and buyers every day.

data.description: Portaryte® 010 is the naturally occurring form of barium sulfate (BaS04). It has a high specific gravity (4.5) and very low solubility. The Portaryte® natural baryte range delivers a variety of benefits, from improving UV and chemical resistance in coatings to increasing soundproofing in plastics and enhancing friction in brake linings.
data.name: Portaryte® 010

summary.name: Synonyms
items: Barium sulphate, Barium white, BaSO4, E 340, Liquibarine, Micropaque

data.description: Portaryte® B10 is produced from carefully selected, very white, naturally occurring baryte. The standardized quality of Portaryte® is guaranteed by means of an ISO 9001-certified quality management plan. The chemical composition of the raw material and the finished product is closely monitored, and the particle size is kept within a narrow variation. Fine grades of Portaryte® fillers have been specially developed for powder coating applications. They are successfully used as an alternative for fine synthetic blanc fixe in high-gloss applications.
data.name: Portaryte® B10

summary.name: Synonyms
items: Barium sulphate, Barium white, BaSO4, E 340, Liquibarine, Micropaque

items: Barium sulphate, Barium white, BaSO4, E 340, Liquibarine, Micropaque

data.description: Dar-Tech Portaryte® C15 is a natural barium sulfate that comes without any residual salts when compared to precipitated grades. This product is closely monitored, and the particle size is kept within a narrow variation. In addition, this natural baryte is easier to disperse than precipitated grades.
data.name: Dar-Tech Portaryte® C15

summary.name: Synonyms
items: Barium sulphate, Barium white, BaSO4, E 340, Liquibarine, Micropaque

data.description: Dar-Tech Portaryte® D15 is produced from carefully selected, naturally occurring off-white baryte. Dar-Tech Portaryte® D is successfully used in applications where excellent chemical inertness is required but high brightness and consistent color are less important, e.g., primers, sealants, and adhesives. The exceptionally high density of baryte makes Dar-Tech Portaryte® D an economical filler of choice for sound deadening in automotive and domestic applications (e.g. sewer pipes). The quality of Dar-Tech Portaryte® D is guaranteed by an ISO 9001-certified quality management plan. The chemical composition of the raw material and the finished product is closely monitored, and the particle size is kept within a narrow variation.
data.name: Dar-Tech Portaryte® D15

HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Chemicals Marketplace - ingredients & raw materials - Knowde

EXPERTS.HEADING: Message Our Experts For a Fast Response

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of suppliers and customers every day.

UNILEVER.QUOTE_CONTENT: Knowde is especially helping us with newer, smaller but up-and-coming suppliers that are useful to have on our radar especially in the field of Sustainability.

CURIO.QUOTE_CONTENT: Purchasing ingredients should always be this easy!

DIAMOND.QUOTE_BY: Diamond Overseas Trading Co. | Technical Manager
DIAMOND.QUOTE_CONTENT: It's an amazing website to search for chemicals and more!

PERSONAL_CARE.TITLE: Healthy Beauty by DSM
PERSONAL_CARE.DESCRIPTION: DSM has taken an in-depth look at the growing enthusiasm for medical beauty to make the best skin care ingredients for non-invasive solutions.

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

KNOWDE_PAY.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A flexible payment service powered by Knowde.
KNOWDE_PAY.LONG_DESCRIPTION: Now you can quickly transact online and avoid the hassle of establishing a new line of credit. Knowde will issue invoices and collect payments on behalf of the Supplier.

EXPERTS_PAGE.TITLE: {companyName} experts - Knowde
EXPERTS_PAGE.WE_CAN_GUIDE_YOU: We can guide you to the best product for your application and answer any questions.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.ORDER_LIMITS: (** Minimum order quantities may apply and exceed standard PRIMETIME Flavors minimum orders. Certain applications excluded.)

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
